thread.title: Vouchers offered to mothers to stop smoking
thread.title_full: Vouchers offered to mothers to stop smoking

title: Vouchers offered to mothers to stop smoking
text: Shopping vouchers worth £260 are offered by a council as a reward to mothers-to-be if they quit smoking while they are pregnant Mothers-to-be are being given shopping vouchers as a reward for quitting smoking during their pregnancies Stoke-on-Trent City Council is offering up to £260 worth of vouchers in a bid to cut the number of infant deaths blamed on smoking in the city At least 65 women have so far received the Love2Shop vouchers, which can be redeemed in popular stores, including Debenhams, Argos and TK Maxx
